data.title: All Theatre Shows — Main Stage Community Theatre
data.meta_description: The Main Stage Community Theatre presents well-known and original stage performances all year long. From heartwarming tales like Beauty and the Beast to rollicking musicals like All Shook Up, the cast and crew know how to bring the best of musical theater to the Lowcountry.
data.text:
Jekyll & Hyde, The Musical

September 12 - 15, 19 - 22

Seahawk Cultural Center, Hilton Head High School

Prepare to be captivated by the thrilling and haunting tale of Jekyll & Hyde, the Musical, brought to life by the talented cast of Main Stage Community Theatre. This September, step into the world of Dr. Henry Jekyll, a brilliant but troubled scientist, as he grapples with the duality of human nature and the terrifying consequences of his experiments.

June 20 - 23 and June 27 - 30

Oliver!

Hilton Head Prep’s Main Street Theatre

Set to grace the stage this June in Hilton Head, this award-winning musical promises to captivate audiences with its unforgettable characters and timeless songs. Based on Charles Dickens' beloved novel, Oliver Twist, Lionel Bart's classic musical adaptation has earned Tony, Olivier, and Academy Awards, solidifying its status as a true theatrical masterpiece.

INTO THE WOODS, JR.

NOVEMBER 16 - 19, 2023

Presented by Court Atkins Group

Get ready to be spellbound this November as Main Stage Community Theatre proudly presents its magical production of Into The Woods, Jr. This whimsical musical will transport audiences to a fantastical realm where beloved fairy tale characters embark on a thrilling journey through the woods to fulfill their deepest wishes.

THE WEDDING SINGER

JUNE 23-25 AND JUNE 29 - JULY 2, 2023

Presented by Court Atkins Group

The Wedding Singer takes us back to a time when hair was big, greed was good, collars were up and a wedding singer might just be the coolest guy in the room. Based on the hit Adam Sandler movie, The Wedding Singer's sparkling new score does for the '80s what Hairspray did for the '60s. Just say yes to the most romantic musical in twenty years.

The Odd Couple (PG-13)

February 17, 18, 19 & 24 - 26, 2023

Presented by Court Atkins Group

One of the most celebrated American comedies of all time, and considered Neil Simon’s most well-crafted and popular play, “The Odd Couple” is a hilarious take on the conflicts between two friends when they attempt to live together.

Guys and Dolls, Junior

March 3 - 5, 2023

Presented by Court Atkins Group

Based on the legendary, multi-award-winning, musical comedy classic about rolling the dice and falling in love under the lights of Broadway. This show will be held at the Seahawk Cultural Center on Hilton Head Island.

Footloose, The Musical

November 11-13 & 18-20, 2022

Presented by Court Atkins Group

Join our incredible cast of actors on a journey of self-discovery. Full of high-energy dancing and singing, this is a show you don’t want to miss! Footloose, The Musical is packed with top-ten hits from the past like “Almost Paradise,” “Let’s Hear It for the Boy,” “Holding Out for a Hero,” and “Footloose.” With powerhouse hits from its bestselling Oscar-nominated score, Footloose celebrates the exhilaration of youth, the wisdom of listening to one another, and the power of forgiveness.

The Sound of Music

JUNE 24-26 & JULY 1-3, 2022

Presented by Court Atkins Group

The hills are alive with the sound of music this Spring with Main Stage Community Theatre! The inspirational story, based on the memoir of Maria Augusta Trapp, follows an ebullient postulate who serves as governess to the seven children of the imperious Captain von Trapp, bringing music and joy to the household. But as the forces of Nazism take hold of Austria, Maria and the entire von Trapp family must make a moral decision.

Legally Blonde The Musical, JR.

Thank you for a SOLD OUT performance!

Harvard's beloved blonde takes the stage by glittery pink storm in this fun and upbeat adaptation of the hit film and award-winning Broadway musical. Legally Blonde JR. follows the transformation of Elle Woods as she tackles stereotypes, snobbery and scandal in pursuit of her dreams. Features large, energetic dance numbers with an expandable cast of sorority sisters, law school students, hairdressers and more.

I Love You, You’re Perfect, Now Change

Thank you for a great show!

Join us for dinner and the hilariously popular, off-Broadway comedy, “I love you. You’re perfect. Now change.” Following the highs and lows of first dates, first loves, marriages, babies, in-laws, and growing old together, this hilarious and poignant show pays tribute to those who have loved and lost and to those who have dared to ask someone out on a date. This show is recommended for mature audiences only.

Seussical

Thank you for a SOLD OUT performance!

In this fantastical, magical musical, some of your favorite Dr. Seuss characters are lovingly brought to life with the Cat in the Hat, Horton the Elephant, Gertrude McFuzz, Lazy Mayzie and all of the Whos of Whoville. These classic, colorful tales are brought together by Jojo, a young "thinker of strange and wonderful thinks."

Godspell

November 13-24, 2019

At the behest of John the Baptist, young men and women forsake their jobs and take up the mantle of Jesus Christ—becoming his disciples—in a musical retelling of the Gospel of Matthew set in modern-day New York City.
